actions.text: Reported to House (Amended) by House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.  Report No: 97-50.
Called up by House by Unanimous Consent.
Considered by House Unfinished Business Vote Postponed Until September 22, 1981.
Passed House (Amended) by Yea-Nay Vote: 360 - 42 (Record Vote No: 214).
Laid on Table in House by Voice Vote.
Other Measure S.1210 (Amended) Passed House in Lieu.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Fisheries and Wildlife Conservation and the Environment

official_title: A bill to authorize appropriation for the operations of the Office of Environmental Quality and the Council on Environmental Quality during fiscal years 1982, 1983, and 1984.

summary.text: (Measure passed House, amended, roll call 3214 (360-42)) Amends the Environmental Quality Improvement Act of 1970 to authorize appropriations for the Office of Environmental Quality and the Council on Environmental Quality for fiscal years 1982 through 1984.

titles.title: A bill to authorize appropriation for the operations of the Office of Environmental Quality and the Council on Environmental Quality during fiscal years 1982, 1983, and 1984.
